data.actual_result: Lack of any padding on the bottom between the message separators
data.expected_result: Same amount of padding on the top & bottom between the message separators
data.short_description: No padding between message separators when Show website preview is disable
data.steps_to_repro: - Disable Show website preview in your User Settings -> Text & Images - Go into a channel and have a bot send an embed (cannot have text in the message or be edited and must be a single message from the bot)
